short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add bookmarks and notes to Youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the ultimate companion for Yotube enthusiasts â€“ our Chrome extension, "Youtube Bookmarker". Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between tabs to jot down notes or bookmark important moments during your Youtube video binges. With Youtube Bookmarker, you can seamlessly integrate note-taking and bookmarking directly into your YouTube experience.
